summary: Witcher Race for upcoming \"Witcher : The Untold Story\" mod.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, I would like to present you the Witcher Race that is a part of Witcher : The Untold Story Skyrim overhaul. It\'s a still WIP because i don\'t have a lot of free time, but i\'ll try to keep this mod updated as often as i can.

You Recieve all items right after the cuffs are taken off.

There\'s a small bug with disappearing face. you have to change to the other race in creation screen and then switch back to witcher, and all will work fine.


I recommend you to use 1H on back mod and DUEL.

1HD Weapons on back -> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6276
DUEL -> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2700
Features:

- All of witcher Potions with respective effects full craftable at Cooking Pot (as we all know Witcher\'s mostly used pots to create their Potions).

- Witcher Race with predefined skills and spells

- Witcher Signs (all except for yrden, cause i\'m still thinking about the way i\'ll make them work ). Most of them have also advanced versions.

- Full Witcher Equipment ( credits to hucifer, L0rd0fWar,  Dahaka00201 and AlphaWoIF ) including Geralt\'s face and armors/swords.

Planned Updates :

- Oils
- Yrden sign and other Advanced Signs
- New skin/body model
- resistance to SKYRIM potions
- Tweaks And Balancing

Post any feedback in the comments.
author: randal20
